questions.question: Thể hiện  (5−7i)(5 - 7{i})(5−7i)   +++   (5−8i)(5 - 8{i})(5−8i)  ở dạng  a+iba+iba+ib.
questions.explanation:
nnn   =5−7i = 5 - 7{i}=5−7i  và  zzz   =5−8i = 5 - 8{i}=5−8i 

q=n+z q = n+zq=n+z 

 =(5−7i) = (5 - 7{i})=(5−7i)   +++   (5−8i)(5 - 8{i})(5−8i)   =(5+5)+(−7i−8i) = (5+5)+( - 7{i} - 8{i})=(5+5)+(−7i−8i) 

 =10−15i = 10 - 15{i}=10−15i.

questions.question: Đạo hàm của  (log⁡6x)6log⁡6x,6x>1(\log 6x)^{6\log 6x}, 6x > 1(log6x)6log6x,6x>1  , theo  xxx  là gì?
questions.explanation:
Gọi  y=(log⁡6x)6log⁡6xy = (\log 6x)^{6\log 6x}y=(log6x)6log6x 

Lấy logarit cả hai vế, ta được

 log⁡y=6log⁡6xlog⁡(log⁡6x)\log y = 6\log 6x \log(\log 6x)logy=6log6xlog(log6x) 

Lấy đạo hàm cả hai vế theo  xxx  , ta được

 1ydydx=6[log⁡6xddx(log⁡(log⁡6x))+log⁡(log⁡6x)ddx(log⁡6x)]\frac{1}{y}\frac{dy}{dx} = 6\bigg[\log 6x\frac{d}{dx}(\log(\log 6x)) + \log(\log 6x)\frac{d}{dx}(\log 6x)\bigg]y1​dxdy​=6[log6xdxd​(log(log6x))+log(log6x)dxd​(log6x)] 

   ⟹  dydx\implies \frac{dy}{dx}⟹dxdy​ 
===
 6y[log⁡6x1log⁡6xddx(log⁡6x)+log⁡(log⁡6x)16xddx(6x)] 6y\bigg[\log 6x\frac{1}{\log 6x}\frac{d}{dx}(\log 6x) + \log(\log 6x)\frac{1}{6x}\frac{d}{dx}(6x)\bigg]6y[log6xlog6x1​dxd​(log6x)+log(log6x)6x1​dxd​(6x)] 
===
 6y[log⁡6x1log⁡6x16xddx(6x)+log⁡(log⁡6x)16x6] 6y\bigg[\log 6x\frac{1}{\log 6x}\frac{1}{6x}\frac{d}{dx}(6x) + \log(\log 6x)\frac{1}{6x}6\bigg]6y[log6xlog6x1​6x1​dxd​(6x)+log(log6x)6x1​6] 
===
 6y[1x+log⁡(log⁡6x)x] 6y\bigg[\frac{1}{x} + \frac{\log(\log 6x)}{x}\bigg]6y[x1​+xlog(log6x)​] 
===
 6(log⁡6x)6log⁡6x[1x+log⁡(log⁡6x)x] 6(\log 6x)^{6\log 6x}\bigg[\frac{1}{x} + \frac{\log(\log 6x)}{x}\bigg]6(log6x)6log6x[x1​+xlog(log6x)​]
